title: How to Unblock Someone on Cash App: Quick Tutorial & Expert Tips

steps.title: Tap on the Activity tab on your Cash App home screen.
steps.content: Tap on the Activity tab on your Cash App home screen. It is in the bottom-right corner, and has an icon of a clock.

steps.title: Scroll until you find the blocked user, then tap on their name.
steps.content: Scroll until you find the blocked user, then tap on their name. These are the same steps to blocking someone on Cash App , but instead of blocking them, you will be unblocking them.

steps.title: Tap Unblock at the bottom of their profile.
steps.content: Tap Unblock at the bottom of their profile. The user will now be unblocked, and you can send and receive money from that user again. [1] X Research source If you decide to block that user (or any other user) again, simply repeat the above steps but select Block instead of Unblock .
